citations.narrative:
-There is a broken board between two adult male sheep and a new singly housed male sheep.
-Three adult male goats are in an enclosure where the back, sliding door of the shelter is off and laying on the ground.
-There is a single cow named "Daisy" in an enclosure with several boards of the enclosure broken.
All facilities housing animals must be maintained in good repair to prevent injury to the animals contained.
The facility must be constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for the animals involved. The indoor
and outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals
from injury and to contain the animals.

When the door to the potbellied pig enclosure was opened a swarm of flies was at the entrance inside. Numerous flies
were seen on the ground inside the enclosures and on the shelters provided to the pigs. There was a single fly trap
hanging from the ceiling that was full of flies.
Large numbers of flies in animal areas can be bothersome to the animals contained and promote disease issues.
A safe and effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests shall be
established and maintained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with an employee and the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
KURT HAMMEL, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
